game.title: Blobjam
game.description: A modern twist on classic bubble popping gameplay! Shoot the blobs to match 3 of the same colour and pop them. Blobjam has realistic physics, so aim carefully -- those blobs have a habit of squidging around in ways you don't expect.
game.history: Blobjam is Orange Helicopter's first game. What started out as a happy childhood memory of Puzzle Bobble, an experiment with OpenGL shaders and a desire to use Box2D physics for something eventually transformed into a full game. It's called Blobjam because I had toast and jam for breakfast that morning, and Blobtoast would be a stupid name.

features.feature: Endless match-3 gameplay with realistic physics.
Compare scores with your Facebook friends and the rest of the world.
Collect falling coins and use them to buy power-ups.
Complete missions to earn more coins.
Free-to-play, supported by ads and optional in-app purchases of coins.
